review_blob: Nice creamy Milk stout. This is a good example of the style of beer. Left Hand has a lot of creamy, sweet flavors.

I dont know how a Chocolate Stout can get better then this. This captures the flavor of a full bodied stout then adds a creamy chocolate flavor on top. My wife, who does not typically enjoy stouts, really liked this. I drank it chilled, but not too cold so the aroma really had a chance to come out.

Ive tried nearly a dozen pumpkin ales and this by far is my favorite. If youre looking with a pumpkin ale that really captures the flavor of pumpkin pie then this is the beer for you. It has a creamy vanilla note to it that almost all other pumpkin ales Ive tried are missing. This is heavy on the spice and pumpkin flavor, while still letting the taste of the beer through.
The high alcohol content overpowers the chocolate notes of the beer giving it a slightly off taste
